content.question: Which of the following late-twentieth-century developments most directly helped resolve the dilemma (expressed in Source 1) between producing enough food and producing cash crops to grow the economy?

choices.label: Outsourcing of industrial manufacturing to East and South Asia

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
